kw.name: Generate E2E Namkaran Test Data For House
kw.doc: Generates unique test data for E2E House Namkaran validation

kw.name: Click on the Namkaran Card
kw.doc: Click on Namkaran card in Explore section Opens the Namkaran feature page with categories

kw.name: Click on Add Namkaran Button
kw.doc: Click on Add Namkaran button to create new Namkaran request Opens the Namkaran form for creating new submission

kw.name: Click on the Apply Now Button
kw.doc: Click Apply Now button to start Namkaran application Scrolls to find the button and clicks it

kw.name: Click on the I agree Button
kw.doc: Click I Agree button to accept terms and conditions Required to proceed with Namkaran application

kw.name: Verify Namkaran screen
kw.doc: Verifies Namkaran screen is displayed with retry mechanism Uses 3 retry attempts to handle timing issues Validates that Namkaran Categories element is visible

kw.name: Select House Namkaran from category dropdown
kw.doc: Select House Namkaran category from dropdown Opens category dropdown and selects House Namkaran option

kw.name: Enter E2E House Namkaran Data
kw.doc: Enters the generated E2E test data into House Namkaran form using correct label-based locators (same structure as Business)

kw.name: Select NO Radio Button
kw.doc: Selects the NO radio button for multiple name choice question

kw.name: Verify Namkaran Submission Response
kw.doc: Verifies if namkaran submission was successful and extracts the Namkaran ID from the Submitted Namkaran list

kw.name: Close Gurutattva App
kw.doc: Safely closes app with proper cleanup sequence

kw.name: Open Web Browser
kw.doc: Opens web browser and navigates to Gurutattva website

kw.name: Login in with valid credentials
kw.doc: Logs in to web application with valid credentials

kw.name: Click on the Namkaran Management Menu
kw.doc: Navigates to Namkaran Management section

kw.name: Verify the created Namkaran
kw.doc: Searches for namkaran by Namkaran ID (if available) or email and verifies the data in CMS detail page

kw.name: Generate E2E Namkaran Test Data For Bride With YES Option
kw.doc: Generates unique test data for E2E Bride Namkaran with YES option for multiple names

kw.name: Click on the Namkaran Card
kw.doc: Click on Namkaran card in Explore section Opens the Namkaran feature page with categories

kw.name: Click on Add Namkaran Button
kw.doc: Click on Add Namkaran button to create new Namkaran request Opens the Namkaran form for creating new submission

kw.name: Click on the Apply Now Button
kw.doc: Click Apply Now button to start Namkaran application Scrolls to find the button and clicks it

kw.name: Click on the I agree Button
kw.doc: Click I Agree button to accept terms and conditions Required to proceed with Namkaran application

kw.name: Verify Namkaran screen
kw.doc: Verifies Namkaran screen is displayed with retry mechanism Uses 3 retry attempts to handle timing issues Validates that Namkaran Categories element is visible

kw.name: Select Bride Namkaran from category dropdown
kw.doc: Select Bride Namkaran category from dropdown Opens category dropdown and selects Bride Namkaran option

kw.name: Enter E2E Bride Namkaran Data
kw.doc: Enters ALL test data using label-based locators (most reliable)

kw.name: Select Marriage Date
kw.doc: Select marriage date from date picker Opens date picker and selects date by clicking OK (Specific date selection logic commented out, using current date)

kw.name: Select YES Radio Button And Enter Name Choices For Bride
kw.doc: Selects YES radio button and enters name choices for Bride Namkaran (called AFTER Marriage Date selection)

kw.name: Verify Namkaran Submission Response
kw.doc: Verifies if namkaran submission was successful and extracts the Namkaran ID from the Submitted Namkaran list

kw.name: Close Gurutattva App
kw.doc: Safely closes app with proper cleanup sequence

kw.name: Open Web Browser
kw.doc: Opens web browser and navigates to Gurutattva website

kw.name: Login in with valid credentials
kw.doc: Logs in to web application with valid credentials

kw.name: Click on the Namkaran Management Menu
kw.doc: Navigates to Namkaran Management section

kw.name: Verify the created Namkaran
kw.doc: Searches for namkaran by Namkaran ID (if available) or email and verifies the data in CMS detail page

kw.name: Generate E2E Namkaran Test Data For House With YES Option
kw.doc: Generates unique test data for E2E House Namkaran with YES option for multiple names

kw.name: Click on the Namkaran Card
kw.doc: Click on Namkaran card in Explore section Opens the Namkaran feature page with categories

kw.name: Click on Add Namkaran Button
kw.doc: Click on Add Namkaran button to create new Namkaran request Opens the Namkaran form for creating new submission

kw.name: Click on the Apply Now Button
kw.doc: Click Apply Now button to start Namkaran application Scrolls to find the button and clicks it

kw.name: Click on the I agree Button
kw.doc: Click I Agree button to accept terms and conditions Required to proceed with Namkaran application

kw.name: Verify Namkaran screen
kw.doc: Verifies Namkaran screen is displayed with retry mechanism Uses 3 retry attempts to handle timing issues Validates that Namkaran Categories element is visible

kw.name: Select House Namkaran from category dropdown
kw.doc: Select House Namkaran category from dropdown Opens category dropdown and selects House Namkaran option

kw.name: Enter E2E House Namkaran Data
kw.doc: Enters the generated E2E test data into House Namkaran form using correct label-based locators (same structure as Business)

kw.name: Select YES Radio Button And Enter Name Choices For House
kw.doc: Selects YES radio button and enters name choices for House Namkaran (called AFTER Enter E2E House Namkaran Data)

kw.name: Verify Namkaran Submission Response
kw.doc: Verifies if namkaran submission was successful and extracts the Namkaran ID from the Submitted Namkaran list

kw.name: Close Gurutattva App
kw.doc: Safely closes app with proper cleanup sequence

kw.name: Open Web Browser
kw.doc: Opens web browser and navigates to Gurutattva website

kw.name: Login in with valid credentials
kw.doc: Logs in to web application with valid credentials

kw.name: Click on the Namkaran Management Menu
kw.doc: Navigates to Namkaran Management section

kw.name: Verify the created Namkaran
kw.doc: Searches for namkaran by Namkaran ID (if available) or email and verifies the data in CMS detail page

kw.name: Login As Namkaran User

kw.name: Generate E2E Namkaran Test Data For Bride
kw.doc: Generates unique test data for E2E Namkaran validation

kw.name: Click on the Namkaran Card
kw.doc: Click on Namkaran card in Explore section Opens the Namkaran feature page with categories

kw.name: Click on Add Namkaran Button
kw.doc: Click on Add Namkaran button to create new Namkaran request Opens the Namkaran form for creating new submission

kw.name: Click on the Apply Now Button
kw.doc: Click Apply Now button to start Namkaran application Scrolls to find the button and clicks it

kw.name: Click on the I agree Button
kw.doc: Click I Agree button to accept terms and conditions Required to proceed with Namkaran application

kw.name: Verify Namkaran screen
kw.doc: Verifies Namkaran screen is displayed with retry mechanism Uses 3 retry attempts to handle timing issues Validates that Namkaran Categories element is visible

kw.name: Select Bride Namkaran from category dropdown
kw.doc: Select Bride Namkaran category from dropdown Opens category dropdown and selects Bride Namkaran option

kw.name: Enter E2E Bride Namkaran Data
kw.doc: Enters ALL test data using label-based locators (most reliable)

kw.name: Select Marriage Date
kw.doc: Select marriage date from date picker Opens date picker and selects date by clicking OK (Specific date selection logic commented out, using current date)

kw.name: Select NO Radio Button
kw.doc: Selects the NO radio button for multiple name choice question

kw.name: Verify Namkaran Submission Response
kw.doc: Verifies if namkaran submission was successful and extracts the Namkaran ID from the Submitted Namkaran list

kw.name: Get Namkaran ID From First Record
kw.doc: Extracts Namkaran ID from the first record (latest/newest record) in the submitted namkaran list on mobile app Since newly added records always appear at the top, we simply take the first record

kw.name: Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Close Gurutattva App
kw.doc: Safely closes app with proper cleanup sequence

kw.name: Open Web Browser
kw.doc: Opens web browser and navigates to Gurutattva website

kw.name: Login in with valid credentials
kw.doc: Logs in to web application with valid credentials

kw.name: Navigate To Namkaran Management In CMS
kw.doc: Navigates to Namkaran Management section in CMS

kw.name: Verify Namkaran In In Progress Status
kw.doc: Verifies that the namkaran is in In Progress status using Namkaran ID

kw.name: Click Three Dots And View For Namkaran By ID
kw.doc: Clicks the three dots menu and view button for the namkaran using Namkaran ID NOTE: Search filter remains active (no page reload after Export)

kw.name: Verify Bride And Groom Details In CMS
kw.doc: Verifies bride and groom details on the namkaran detail page

kw.name: Generate Random Name For Guruji Suggestion
kw.doc: Generates a random name for Guruji suggestion

kw.name: Enter Guruji Suggested Name
kw.doc: Enters the Guruji suggested name

kw.name: Generate Dummy Remarks For Namkaran
kw.doc: Generates dummy remarks for namkaran approval/rejection

kw.name: Enter Namkaran Remarks
kw.doc: Enters remarks for the namkaran

kw.name: Click Approve Button
kw.doc: Clicks the approve button

kw.name: Verify Namkaran Status Changed To Completed By ID
kw.doc: Verifies that the namkaran status has changed to completed using Namkaran ID

kw.name: Login As Namkaran User
kw.doc: Login with Community Member (9999999999) for Namkaran tests Step 1: Check which screen we are on (Home or Login) Step 2: If Home screen -> Logout first Step 3: Login with 9999999999

kw.name: Generate E2E Namkaran Test Data For House
kw.doc: Generates unique test data for E2E House Namkaran validation

kw.name: Click on the Namkaran Card
kw.doc: Click on Namkaran card in Explore section Opens the Namkaran feature page with categories

kw.name: Click on Add Namkaran Button
kw.doc: Click on Add Namkaran button to create new Namkaran request Opens the Namkaran form for creating new submission

kw.name: Click on the Apply Now Button
kw.doc: Click Apply Now button to start Namkaran application Scrolls to find the button and clicks it

kw.name: Click on the I agree Button
kw.doc: Click I Agree button to accept terms and conditions Required to proceed with Namkaran application

kw.name: Verify Namkaran screen
kw.doc: Verifies Namkaran screen is displayed with retry mechanism Uses 3 retry attempts to handle timing issues Validates that Namkaran Categories element is visible

kw.name: Select House Namkaran from category dropdown
kw.doc: Select House Namkaran category from dropdown Opens category dropdown and selects House Namkaran option

kw.name: Enter E2E House Namkaran Data
kw.doc: Enters the generated E2E test data into House Namkaran form using correct label-based locators (same structure as Business)

kw.name: Select NO Radio Button
kw.doc: Selects the NO radio button for multiple name choice question

kw.name: Verify Namkaran Submission Response
kw.doc: Verifies if namkaran submission was successful and extracts the Namkaran ID from the Submitted Namkaran list

kw.name: Get Namkaran ID From First Record
kw.doc: Extracts Namkaran ID from the first record (latest/newest record) in the submitted namkaran list on mobile app Since newly added records always appear at the top, we simply take the first record

kw.name: Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Close Gurutattva App
kw.doc: Safely closes app with proper cleanup sequence

kw.name: Open Web Browser
kw.doc: Opens web browser and navigates to Gurutattva website

kw.name: Login in with valid credentials
kw.doc: Logs in to web application with valid credentials

kw.name: Navigate To Namkaran Management In CMS
kw.doc: Navigates to Namkaran Management section in CMS

kw.name: Verify Namkaran In In Progress Status
kw.doc: Verifies that the namkaran is in In Progress status using Namkaran ID

kw.name: Click Three Dots And View For Namkaran By ID
kw.doc: Clicks the three dots menu and view button for the namkaran using Namkaran ID NOTE: Search filter remains active (no page reload after Export)

kw.name: Verify House Owner Details In CMS
kw.doc: Verifies house owner details on the namkaran detail page

kw.name: Login As Namkaran User
kw.doc: Login with Community Member (9999999999) for Namkaran tests Step 1: Check which screen we are on (Home or Login) Step 2: If Home screen -> Logout first Step 3: Login with 9999999999

kw.name: Generate E2E Namkaran Test Data For Business
kw.doc: Generates unique test data for E2E Business Namkaran validation

kw.name: Click on the Namkaran Card
kw.doc: Click on Namkaran card in Explore section Opens the Namkaran feature page with categories

kw.name: Click on Add Namkaran Button
kw.doc: Click on Add Namkaran button to create new Namkaran request Opens the Namkaran form for creating new submission

kw.name: Click on the Apply Now Button
kw.doc: Click Apply Now button to start Namkaran application Scrolls to find the button and clicks it

kw.name: Click on the I agree Button
kw.doc: Click I Agree button to accept terms and conditions Required to proceed with Namkaran application

kw.name: Verify Namkaran screen
kw.doc: Verifies Namkaran screen is displayed with retry mechanism Uses 3 retry attempts to handle timing issues Validates that Namkaran Categories element is visible

kw.name: Select Business Namkaran from category dropdown
kw.doc: Select Business Namkaran category from dropdown Opens category dropdown and selects Business Namkaran option

kw.name: Enter E2E Business Namkaran Data
kw.doc: Enters the generated E2E test data into Business Namkaran form using correct label-based locators

kw.name: Select NO Radio Button
kw.doc: Selects the NO radio button for multiple name choice question

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Verify Namkaran Submission Response
kw.doc: Verifies if namkaran submission was successful and extracts the Namkaran ID from the Submitted Namkaran list

kw.name: Get Namkaran ID From First Record
kw.doc: Extracts Namkaran ID from the first record (latest/newest record) in the submitted namkaran list on mobile app Since newly added records always appear at the top, we simply take the first record

kw.name: Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Close Gurutattva App
kw.doc: Safely closes app with proper cleanup sequence

kw.name: Open Web Browser
kw.doc: Opens web browser and navigates to Gurutattva website

kw.name: Login in with valid credentials
kw.doc: Logs in to web application with valid credentials

kw.name: Navigate To Namkaran Management In CMS
kw.doc: Navigates to Namkaran Management section in CMS

kw.name: Verify Namkaran In In Progress Status
kw.doc: Verifies that the namkaran is in In Progress status using Namkaran ID

kw.name: Click Three Dots And View For Namkaran By ID
kw.doc: Clicks the three dots menu and view button for the namkaran using Namkaran ID NOTE: Search filter remains active (no page reload after Export)

kw.name: Verify Business Owner Details In CMS
kw.doc: Verifies business owner details on the namkaran detail page

kw.name: Generate Dummy Remarks For Namkaran
kw.doc: Generates dummy remarks for namkaran approval/rejection

kw.name: Enter Namkaran Remarks
kw.doc: Enters remarks for the namkaran

kw.name: Click Reject Button
kw.doc: Clicks the reject button

kw.name: Verify Namkaran Status Changed To Rejected By ID
kw.doc: Verifies that the namkaran status has changed to rejected using Namkaran ID

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.arg: üéâ Admin Rejection Test for Business Namkaran Completed Successfully!
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.
